草創.definition: to be in the early stages of establishing

草包.definition: bag made of woven straw; bag filled with straw; (fig.) a good-for-nothing; clumsy oaf

草原灰伯勞.definition: (bird species of China) steppe grey shrike (Lanius pallidirostris)

草原百靈.definition: (bird species of China) calandra lark (Melanocorypha calandra)

草原鵰.definition: (bird species of China) steppe eagle (Aquila nipalensis)

草原鷂.definition: (bird species of China) pallid harrier (Circus macrourus)

草地鷚.definition: (bird species of China) meadow pipit (Anthus pratensis)

草屯.definition: Caotun Township in Nantou County 南投縣|南投县[Nan2tou2 Xian4], central Taiwan

草屯鎮.definition: Caotun Township in Nantou County 南投縣|南投县[Nan2tou2 Xian4], central Taiwan

草擬.definition: first draft; to draw up (a first version)

草書.definition: grass script; cursive script (Chinese calligraphic style)

草木皆兵.definition: lit. every tree or bush an enemy soldier (idiom); fig. to panic and treat everyone as an enemy; to feel beleaguered

草標.definition: (old) sign made of woven weeds, placed on an object, an animal or a person, indicating that it is for sale.

草民.definition: the grass roots; the hoi polloi

草泥馬.definition: grass mud horse; used as a substitute for 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1], to mock or avoid censorship on the Internet

草滿囹圄.definition: lit. jails overgrown with grass (idiom); fig. peaceful society

草率收兵.definition: to work vaguely then retreat (idiom); sloppy and half-hearted; half-baked

草碼.definition: the ten numerals 〡,〢,〣,〤,〥,〦,〧,〨,〩,十 nowadays mainly used in traditional trades such as Chinese medicine

草紙.definition: rough straw paper; toilet paper; brown paper

草綠籬鶯.definition: (bird species of China) eastern olivaceous warbler (Iduna pallida)

草臺班子.definition: small, poorly-equipped theatrical troupe that tours small towns and villages; (fig.) makeshift band of individuals; rough and ready outfit

草船借箭.definition: lit. using straw boats to borrow arrows (idiom, from 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]); fig. to use others' manpower and resources for one's own ends

草芥人命.definition: see 草菅人命[cao3 jian1 ren2 ming4]

草草了事.definition: to rush through the work; to get through a thing carelessly

草草收兵.definition: to work vaguely then retreat (idiom); sloppy and half-hearted; half-baked

草草收場.definition: to rush to conclude a matter; to end up abruptly

草莓.definition: strawberry; CL:顆|颗[ke1]; (Tw) hickey; love bite

草莓族.definition: pampered young people unaccustomed to hardship (Tw)

草莽.definition: a rank growth of grass; uncultivated land; wilderness

草菅人命.definition: to have disregard for human life (idiom)

草菇.definition: straw mushroom (Volvariella volvacea); paddy straw mushroom

草鴞.definition: (bird species of China) eastern grass owl (Tyto longimembris)

草鷺.definition: (bird species of China) purple heron (Ardea purpurea)
